00062 #ifndef __DACOMMS_API_H__
00063 #define __DACOMMS_API_H__
00064 
00065 #include "img_defs.h"
00066

00072 /*============================================================================
00073 ====    D E F I N E S
00074 =============================================================================*/
00075 
00076 #define DACOMMS_SPI                                                     (0)
00077 #define DACOMMS_SDIO                                            (1)
00078 #define DACOMMS_USB                                                     (2)
00079 
00080 // SPI/SDIO/USB Version
00081 #define DACOMMS_VARIANT                                         (DACOMMS_USB)
00082 
00083 #define DACOMMS_NUM_HOST_ASYNC_QUEUES           (5)
00084 #define DACOMMS_NUM_GROUPED_BUFFERS                     (2)
00085 
00086 #define DACOMMS_PAYLOAD_START                           (sizeof( DACOMMSMsgHeader ) + sizeof( IMG_UINT8 ) + sizeof( IMG_UINT32 ))
00087 #define DACOMMS_PACKET_PROTOCOL_SIZE            (sizeof( DACOMMSMsgHeader ) + /* Header */                      \
00088                                                                                         sizeof( IMG_UINT8 ) +            /* Message type */             \
00089                                                                                         sizeof( IMG_UINT32 ) +       /* Payload length */       \
00090                                                                                         2 * sizeof( IMG_UINT8 ) +        /* CRC */                              \
00091                                                                                         sizeof( DACOMMSMsgTrailer ))     /* Trailer */                  
00092 
00093 
00094 //#define DACOMMS_USE_CRC                                                                       // Comment this out to disable the use of CRC in transfers
00095 
00096 #ifdef DACOMMS_USE_CRC
00097 #define X25_INIT                                0xFFFFU                                         // X25 CRC bits'n'pieces
00098 #define X25_RES                                 0x1D0FU
00099 #endif
00100 
00101 // SDIO specific 
00102 #if DACOMMS_VARIANT == DACOMMS_SDIO
00103 
00104         #define SDIO_ES1                                (0)
00105         #define SDIO_ES2                                (1)
00106         #define SDIO_XENIF                              (2)
00107         
00108         #define SDIO_OS_XP                              (0)
00109         #define SDIO_OS_VISTA                   (1)
00110 
00111         #define SDIO_HARDWARE                   (SDIO_XENIF)                            // CHANGE THIS TO TARGET HARDWARE
00112         #define HOST_OS                                 (SDIO_OS_VISTA)                         // CHANGE THIS TO HOST OS
00113         #define ASYNC_DATA_SIZE                 (16384 * 2)                                     // CHANGE TO SUIT APPLICATION, max of 32K
00114 
00115         #if ( HOST_OS == SDIO_OS_XP ) && ( ( SDIO_HARDWARE == SDIO_ES1 ) || ( SDIO_HARDWARE == SDIO_ES2 ) )
00116                 #define SDIO_64BYTE_BUG                 (1)
00117         #endif
00118 
00119         #if SDIO_64BYTE_BUG == 1
00120                 #define SDIO_OSCAR_XP_LIMIT             (64)
00121         #endif
00122 
00123         #if ( HOST_OS == SDIO_OS_VISTA) && ( SDIO_HARDWARE == SDIO_ES1 )
00124                 #define SDIO_BYTEBLOCK_BUG              (1)
00125         #endif
00126 
00127         #if HOST_OS == SDIO_OS_XP
00128                 // There is no block mode in vista, so max transfer is 511 bytes
00129                 #define DACOMMS_MSG_DATA_SIZE   (511 - DACOMMS_PACKET_PROTOCOL_SIZE)
00130         #elif HOST_OS == SDIO_OS_VISTA
00131                 // We want to make the whole transfer greater than 512 bytes so that vista uses Block Mode
00132                 #define DACOMMS_MSG_DATA_SIZE   (ASYNC_DATA_SIZE - DACOMMS_PACKET_PROTOCOL_SIZE)
00133         #endif
00134         #define DACOMMS_ASYNC_DATA_SIZE         (DACOMMS_MSG_DATA_SIZE + DACOMMS_PACKET_PROTOCOL_SIZE)
00135 
00136 #elif DACOMMS_VARIANT == DACOMMS_SPI
00137 
00138         #define DACOMMS_MSG_DATA_SIZE           (500)           // For CMD/RSP transactions
00139         #define DACOMMS_ASYNC_DATA_SIZE         (3 * 1024) // For Async transactions
00140 
00141 #elif DACOMMS_VARIANT == DACOMMS_USB
00142 
00143         #define DACOMMS_MSG_DATA_SIZE           (500)           // For CMD/RSP transactions
00144         #define DACOMMS_ASYNC_DATA_SIZE         (512 * 1024) // For Async transactions
00145 
00146 #else
00147 
00148         #error Invalid Dacomms Variant Specified!
00149 
00150 #endif
00151 
00152 
00153 
00154 
00155 /*============================================================================
00156 ====    E N U M S
00157 =============================================================================*/
00158 typedef enum
00159 {
00160         H2D_MSG_CMD                                     = 0x00,                         // Command message (H2D)
00161         H2D_MSG_REQ_CMD                         = 0x01,                         // Request for command message
00162         H2D_MSG_REQ_DATA                        = 0x02,                         // Request for data message (rsp or async)
00163         H2D_MSG_NO_TRANSFER                     = 0x03,                         // Do not perform a transfer
00164         
00165         D2H_MSG_RSP_START                       = 0x10,                         // Response start packet
00166         D2H_MSG_RSP_DATA                        = 0x11,                         // Resposne data packet
00167         
00168         D2H_MSG_ASYNC_INFO_START        = 0x20,                         // Async (INFO/EVENT) start packet
00169         D2H_MSG_ASYNC_DATA                      = 0x21,                         // Async data packet (D2H)
00170         D2H_MSG_ASYNC_DATA_START        = 0x30,                         // Async (DATA) start packet
00171 
00172         D2H_MSG_ACK                                     = 0xF0,
00173         D2H_MSG_NACK                            = 0xF1,                 
00174 
00175 } COMMS_eMessageType;
00176 
00177 /*============================================================================
00178 ====    T Y P E D E F S
00179 =============================================================================*/
00180 
00186 typedef union DACOMMS_tag_sStartMsg
00187 {
00188         struct
00189         {
00190                 IMG_UINT8               ui8Header[2];
00191                 IMG_UINT8               ui8MessageType;
00192                 IMG_UINT8               ui8GroupIndex;
00193                 IMG_UINT32              ui32Length;
00194                 IMG_UINT8               ui8Checksum[2];
00195                 IMG_UINT8               ui8Trailer[2];
00196         } s;
00197         IMG_UINT8                       ui8Data[12];
00198 } DACOMMS_sStartMsg;
00199 
00200 #ifdef WIN32
00201 #pragma pack(push, 1)
00202 #endif
00203 
00204 typedef union DACOMMS_tag_sAckMsg
00205 {
00206         struct
00207         {
00208                 IMG_UINT8               ui8Header[2];
00209                 IMG_UINT8               ui8MessageType; // Ack or Nack
00210                 IMG_UINT8               ui8Trailer[2];
00211 #if DACOMMS_VARIANT == DACOMMS_SDIO
00212 #if SDIO_HARDWARE == SDIO_ES1
00213                 IMG_UINT8               ui8Padding[3];
00214 #else
00215                 IMG_UINT8               ui8Padding;
00216 #endif
00217 #endif
00218 
00219 #if !defined WIN32
00220         }__attribute__((__packed__)) s;
00221 #else
00222         } s;
00223 #endif
00224 
00225 #if DACOMMS_VARIANT == DACOMMS_SDIO
00226 #if SDIO_HARDWARE == SDIO_ES1
00227         IMG_UINT8                       ui8Data[8];
00228 #else
00229         IMG_UINT8                       ui8Data[6];
00230 #endif
00231 #else
00232         IMG_UINT8                       ui8Data[5];
00233 #endif
00234 
00235 #if !defined WIN32
00236 } __attribute__((__packed__)) DACOMMS_sAckMsg;
00237 #else
00238 } DACOMMS_sAckMsg;
00239 #endif
00240 
00241 #if defined WIN32
00242 #pragma pack(pop)
00243 #endif
00244 
00245 /*============================================================================
00246 ====    D A T A
00247 =============================================================================*/
00248 static const IMG_UINT8 DACOMMSMsgHeader[2] = { 0xA5, 0x5A };
00249 static const IMG_UINT8 DACOMMSMsgTrailer[2] = { 0x96, 0x69 };
00250 
00251 #ifdef DACOMMS_USE_CRC
00252 // CRC Table
00253 static const unsigned short X25Tab[16] =
00254 {
00255         0x0000, 0x1021, 0x2042, 0x3063, 0x4084, 0x50A5, 0x60C6, 0x70E7,
00256         0x8108, 0x9129, 0xA14A, 0xB16B, 0xC18C, 0xD1AD, 0xE1CE, 0xF1EF
00257 };
00258 
00259 #endif
